p: Previously, Senguttuvan et al. [ 41] studied the radical scavenging potential of an infusion from the dried leaves of H. radicata and found IC 50 values of 595.23 μg/mL and 2143.1 μmol of Trolox equivalent (TE)/dried weight (DW). Dried leaves are also able to exert their antioxidant activities through other mechanisms, including the protection of lipid peroxidation and ferric reducing power.
